text: Erlend Rian (15 June 1941 – 1 December 2020) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Conservative Party. He was editor-in-chief of the newspaper Tromsø from 1974 to 1979. He was mayor of Tromsø City from 1980 to 1995. Rian died on 1 December 2020 in Tromsø at the age of 79.Erlend Rian er død ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Norwegian mayors Category:Editors Category:Tromsø
title: Erlend Rian
